How do polarizing sunglasses reduce glare?
options: By absorbing certain orientations of light waves
questions.correct_answer: By absorbing certain orientations of light waves

questions.question: What is the Brewster angle?
options: The angle at which reflected light is completely polarized
The angle at which refracted light is completely polarized
The angle of incidence that gives maximum refraction
The angle of incidence that gives minimum refraction
questions.correct_answer: The angle at which reflected light is completely polarized

questions.question: How does a convex lens focus light?
options: It reflects the light in parallel rays
It focuses the light to a point
It does not affect the light
questions.correct_answer: It focuses the light to a point

questions.question: What is the main difference between geometrical optics and physical optics?
options: Geometrical optics deals with ray propagation, while physical optics involves wave nature of light
Geometrical optics involves wave nature of light, while physical optics deals with ray propagation
Geometrical optics focuses on reflection, while physical optics deals with refraction
Geometrical optics focuses on refraction, while physical optics deals with reflection
questions.correct_answer: Geometrical optics deals with ray propagation, while physical optics involves wave nature of light

questions.question: What principle states that the path taken between two points by a ray of light is the path that can be traversed in the least time?
Which of these best describes the phenomenon of interference in optics?
options: It is the process where the path of light alters due to the presence of an obstacle
It is the redistribution of light energy due to the superposition of two or more coherent light beams
It is the process where light waves bend when they pass from one medium to another
It is the process where light changes direction when it bounces off a surface
questions.correct_answer: It is the redistribution of light energy due to the superposition of two or more coherent light beams
